text: Sammie Lee Burroughs (born June 21, 1973) is a former American football linebacker who played two seasons with the Indianapolis Colts of the National Football League. He first enrolled at Mt. San Antonio College before transferring to Portland State University. He was also a member of the Miami Dolphins. ==References== ==External links== *Just Sports Stats Category:Living people Category:1973 births Category:Players of American football from California Category:American football linebackers Category:African-American players of American football Category:Mt. SAC Mounties football players Category:Portland State Vikings football players Category:Indianapolis Colts players Category:Sportspeople from Pomona, California
title: Sammie Burroughs
